code: import React from"react";import{SocialLinks,pageLinks}from"./data";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Footer=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("footer",{className:"section footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"footer-links",children:pageLinks.map(link=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:link.href,className:"footer-link",children:link.text})},link.id);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"footer-icons",children:SocialLinks.map(links=>{const{id,href,icon}=links;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:href,target:"_blank",className:"footer-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:icon})})},id);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"copyright",children:["copyright \xA9 Backroads travel tours company",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{id:"date",children:new Date().getFullYear()})," all rights reserved"]})]});};export default Footer;
